text: Abacarus is a genus of acari, including the following species: * Abacarus acutatus Sukhareva, 1985 * Abacarus doctus Navia et al., 2011Navia, D., Flechtmann, C.H.W., Lindquist, E.E., & Aguilar, H. (2011). "A new species of Abacarus (Acari: Prostigmata: Eriophyidae) damagaing sugarcane, Sacharum officinarum L., from Costa Rica--the first eriophyid mite described with a tibial seta on leg II." Zootaxa 3025: 51-58. * Abacarus hystrix (Nalepa, 1896) * Abacarus lolii Skoracka, 2009 * Abacarus sacchari Channabasavanna, 1966 ==References== Category:Eriophyidae Category:Trombidiformes genera
title: Abacarus
